relation: Bed Protection Pkg, (Installed by Dealer) (Limited Availability) (N/A w/Bed Rug-VBN, Bed Liner-VZX, Cargo Cover-VQT or Storage Box-RW6) [Includes] Soft Folding Cargo Cover, Rubber Cargo Mat & Tailgate Liner.
Bumper Pkg, Chrome [Includes] F&R Chrome Bumper & Cornersteps.

Convenience Pkg [Models Before 2/17/2014] Include Tilt & Telescoping Steering Wheel (ex When in Combo w/LV3 4.3L Engine). [Includes] Keyless Remote Control Entry System, Deep Tinted Glass, Dual Heated Power Mirrors w/Manual Fold & 110V Power Outlet.

Trailering Equipment, HD Models w/Axle-G80 (Std w/Custom Sport Truck Pkg-PEB, All Star Edition-PDU, Texas Edition-PDA & Trailering Pkg-NHT) [Includes] Trailer Hitch Receiver & 7-Pin to 4-Pin Trailer Wire Connector.
